name: PogoStonk
description:
PogoStonk is a small game made in a short time by 4 students in Game design.

The theme for this game was "Out of reach" and we decided to make a frustrating platformer. Play as a person who somehow ended up strapped to a pogo stick and try to get out of a strange factory. Good luck jumping to the Exit!

Producer: Louise BIRCKEL
Game Design: Killian MOSNIER, Adrien MARCHELLO
Programming: Adrien MARCHELLOLevel Design: Thibaud BAILLY
